title: India pulls officials from Afghanistan's Kandahar as Taliban widens control
content:
1. India pulls officials from Afghanistan's Kandahar as Taliban widens control  Reuters India
  2. Turmoil in Afghanistan: India pulls out diplomats, other officials  WION
  3. Biden is betting big on Afghanistan's air force. But their problems continue to grow.  POLITICO
  4. Taliban claiming control over 85pc Afghan soil - The Khaama Press News Agency  The Khaama Press News Agency
  5. India evacuates diplomats, security personnel from Kandahar as Taliban captures new areas  The Tribune India
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: タリバンの支配が拡大する中、インドはアフガニスタンのカンダハルから政府関係者を引き揚げた。
